mapper.insert: insert into VTProberCard.Probercard_Info(prober_card_id, cust_name, cust_no, receipt_time, vendor_name, vendor_no, belong_dept, use_equipment, dut_count, pin_count, cab_position, card_source, pm_td, card_type, new_old, clean_type, pinlen_spec, pindiam_spec, pinlevel_spec, pindepth_spec, td_total, card_model, release_flag, note) value (#{proberCardId},#{custName},#{custNo},#{receiptTime},#{vendorName},#{vendorNo},#{belongDept},#{useEquipment},#{dutCount},#{pinCount},#{cabPosition},#{cardSource},#{pmTd},#{cardType},#{newOld},#{cleanType},#{pinlenSpec},#{pindiamSpec},#{pinlevelSpec},#{pindepthSpec},#{tdTotal},#{cardModel},#{releaseFlag},#{note});
mapper.select: select prober_card_id, cust_name, cust_no, receipt_time, vendor_name, vendor_no, belong_dept, use_equipment, dut_count, pin_count, cab_position, card_source, pm_td, card_type, new_old, clean_type, pinlen_spec, pindiam_spec, pinlevel_spec, pindepth_spec, td_total, card_model, release_flag, note from VTProberCard.Probercard_Info
